channel.title: String on Roger Molas
channel.description: Recent content in String on Roger Molas

item.title: Multiline String Literals
item.author: contact@rogermolas.com (Roger Molas)
item.description: Long strings are strings delimited by """triple quotes""" that can contain newlines and individual “ characters without the need to escape them. SE-0168 Multi-Line String Literals Multi-Line String Literal Creation let lines = """ This is line one This is line two This is line three """ print("Multi-Line String: \(lines)") Mutation let myString = """ Hello Multi line string! This is sample of mutating string. End here """ let startingIndex = myString.
